        Returns:

      • addDelayList

        public boolean addDelayList(long delay)
        Add a delay to wait for the next wave. Delay is used to synchronize the launching of the Waves
        Parameters:
        delay - The delay to add.
        Returns:
        true if the delay have been added else false;
